name: Hotel Torrecerredo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is perfect for doing stuff in the Picos, climbing, walking, biking, etc etc, and is very reasonable too!
reviews.title: Great location for Climbing in the Picos!

description: If you like: small, owner-managed places brimming with character and run by caring, direct, unpretentious, humorous hosts, with great food, views, and wildlife, the lived-in, the unexpected, the artistic, and even the eccentric. We are for you.
